name: Nico Hülkenberg
introduction: Nicolas "Nico" Hlkenberg (born 19 August 1987 in Emmerich am Rhein, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany) is a German F1 driver. Currently, he is driving for the Haas F1 Team in the 2023 Formula One Season. He started at Williams in 2010 where he scored his maiden pole position at the Brazilian Grand Prix, then moved to ForceIndia where he spent 2011 as a test driver before promotion to a race seat in 2012.  During the race at 2012 Brazilian Grand Prix, he took his first fastest lap, and achieved another at the 2016 Chinese Grand Prix.
